bug.author: vasudevgupta7
bug.description:
When I am running wandb.init(project=..., name=..., config=....) in colab, Its showing this error: <denchmark-code>Thread SenderThread: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/apis/normalize.py", line 24, in wrapper return func(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/internal_api.py", line 968, in upsert_run response = self.gql(mutation, variable_values=variable_values, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/old/retry.py", line 96, in __call__ result = self._call_fn(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/internal_api.py", line 128, in execute return self.client.execute(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/vendor/gql-0.2.0/gql/client.py", line 54, in execute raise Exception(str(result.errors[0])) Exception: {'message': 'Variable "entity" has invalid value null.\nExpected type "String!", found null.', 'locations': [{'line': 1, 'column': 69}]}
During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/internal_util.py", line 33, in run self._run() File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/internal_util.py", line 60, in _run self._process(record) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/internal.py", line 232, in _process self._sm.send(record) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/sender.py", line 90, in send send_handler(record) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/sender.py", line 360, in send_run self._init_run(run, config_dict) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/sender.py", line 396, in _init_run commit=repo.last_commit, File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/apis/normalize.py", line 62, in wrapper six.reraise(CommError, CommError(message, err), sys.exc_info()[2]) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/six.py", line 702, in reraise raise value.with_traceback(tb) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/apis/normalize.py", line 24, in wrapper return func(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/internal_api.py", line 968, in upsert_run response = self.gql(mutation, variable_values=variable_values, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/old/retry.py", line 96, in __call__ result = self._call_fn(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/internal/internal_api.py", line 128, in execute return self.client.execute(*args, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/wandb/vendor/gql-0.2.0/gql/client.py", line 54, in execute raise Exception(str(result.errors[0])) wandb.errors.error.CommError: Variable "entity" has invalid value null. Expected type "String!", found null. </denchmark-code>
Please help me out. Thanks

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vasudevgupta7>@vasudevgupta7</denchmark-link> this was a temporary error in our backend. We just rolled back the bad deploy, if you try again it should be working now, sorry about that. If you're still seeing an error please let us know.
